content: भग्न {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} [भंज्-क्त] {@--1@} Broken, fractured, shattered, torn. {@--2@} Frustrated, foiled, disappointed. {@--3@} Check, ed, arrested, suspended. {@--4@} Marred, impaired. {@--5@} Routed, completely defeated or vanquished; <ls>U. 5.</ls> {@--6@} Demolished, destroyed. (See भंज्). --ग्नं Fracture of the leg.
